ygData.messageBody:
> I put in a Geforce 2TI 64 meg card for the SOL upgrade. I found it
> to be a big improvement over my Geforce 256. I'm looking at getting
> a Geforce 4 in the summer.
>
> And PCI cards are getting hard to find. You should look online, like
> Yahoo shopping, and see what's out there.
>
> Tul
>
I found some stuff at pricegrabber.
http://www.pricegrabber.com/search_getprod.php/masterid=457415/ut=cc77f69c01
9470eb/
it even factors in shipping costs to tell you which will be the best deal
for you including shipping.
pricewatch may have some good prices as well. always good to comparison
shop.
luv,
-Su
